# 軟體工程與演算法 第六週 亂數＋蒙地卡羅

## random1
每次數值都不同
```
PS C:\Users\maybu\Desktop\sa\alg\02-random\random> deno run .\randomTest.js 
0.846406373391801
0.6378740830823517
0.9794686383756925
0.17023293531383388
0.7211339544446673
0.5761298993893433
0.6835093195404625
0.3830493443456362
0.008339072945091175
PS C:\Users\maybu\Desktop\sa\alg\02-random\random> deno run .\randomTest.js
0.11619347998930607
0.16333068664607708
0.8595281595844426
0.8676491743244696
0.9249141238979064
0.11212426226120442
0.1817851282976335
0.905319782497827
0.45307523774681613
```
## random2
每次產生數值順序都固定
```
PS C:\Users\maybu\Desktop\sa\alg\02-random\random> deno run .\random2Test.js
0.7940094328951091
0.377391537418589
0.8408720137085766
0.19487653020769358
0.8352998823393136
0.8078417882788926
0.6857897664885968
0.2777199756819755
0.04474068386480212
PS C:\Users\maybu\Desktop\sa\alg\02-random\random> deno run .\random2Test.js
0.45231413352303207
0.7940094328951091
0.377391537418589
0.8408720137085766
0.19487653020769358
0.8352998823393136
0.8078417882788926
0.6857897664885968
```
